Uses of Package
entities

Packages that use entities
Package
Description
backgrounds
 
entities
 
main
 
  • Classes in entities used by backgrounds
    Class
    Description
    Collider
    the linked boxes to the entities, the ones being checked for collision, contains also the basic methods of collision checking
    HUD
    the scoreboard on the top, its update, draw and animation
  • Classes in entities used by entities
    Class
    Description
    Bomb
    the bombs placed by the player, their update, draw and animation
    Collider
    the linked boxes to the entities, the ones being checked for collision, contains also the basic methods of collision checking
    Entity
    the father class of all entities, their basic variables and methods: collision managing, interactions, direction sorting, images resizing
    Flames
    the flames fired by the senshiyan, their update, draw and animation
    HUD
    the scoreboard on the top, its update, draw and animation
    PowerUp
    the hidden power ups, their update and draw
    Tomb
    created by the enemies when dying, updates the score and starts the animation of death
  • Classes in entities used by main
    Class
    Description
    Collider
    the linked boxes to the entities, the ones being checked for collision, contains also the basic methods of collision checking
    Entity
    the father class of all entities, their basic variables and methods: collision managing, interactions, direction sorting, images resizing
    HUD
    the scoreboard on the top, its update, draw and animation
    Player
    the bomberman, its update, draw and animation
